name: app
description: This project is the back-end server implementation of EdTech Evaluation. ## Development Environment - Node.js Version: 12.18.3 (includes npm 6.14.6) - Express - MySQL Version: Community-8.0.21.0 ### Set up handbook - [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) - [Express](http://expressjs.com/en/starter/installing.html) - [MySQL](https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/) ## How to compile Use 'node server.js' or 'npm start' to compile
